LandingPage.header_description: Develop a direct relationship with your community and generate predictable, recurring revenue from your talent.
LandingPage.why_description: Hey is a Giver company, helping givers build membership businesses that empower them to monetize their talents without selling their soul through advertisement or such.

authPage.terms: By signing in to Hey, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy.

editSpacePage.title: Edit your space
editSpacePage.subtitle: This is what people will see when they'll be looking for help:
editSpacePage.edit_info: You can edit the information here:
editSpacePage.space_name_label: What can you share with the world ?
editSpacePage.space_keywords_label: Add keywords (so people can find you more easily)
editSpacePage.space_description_label: Enter a desctiption of your space. This is what people will see before they subscribe and the content will serve users to find your space.
editSpacePage.sub_price_subtitle: This is where you define how much your community will have to pay every month to subscribe to your space.
editSpacePage.danger_zone_subtitle: You can unpublish your space. People won't be able to subscribe anymore and it won't apprear in the search results anymore.
